metadata.title: CVE-2023-32643 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in GLib. The GVariant deserialization code is vulnerableto a heap buffer overflow introduced by the fix for CVE-2023-32665. Thisbug does not affect any released version of GLib, but does affect GLibdistributors who followed the guidance of GLib developers to backport theinitial fix for CVE-2023-32665.

criterions.comment: glib2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
